repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

scopecontent.head: SCOPE AND CONTENT
scopecontent.p: Summary: Letters chiefly to Leon Lion and Sheila Kaye-Smith and one literary manuscript.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] John Galsworthy Papers, M0017, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

custodhist.head: Provenance:
custodhist.p: Gift of Felton Elkins, Dr. Lorie Tarshis, and Nathan Van Patten; and purchase, 1954-1964

userestrict.head: Publication Rights:
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.
